name: angular-rollup-boilerpplate
description: Simple boiler plate for Angular 2 and Rollup

scripts.build-prod-vendor: rollup -c configs/rollup.config.prod.vendor.js && tsc --out ./prod/vendor.js --target es5 --allowJs prod/vendor.es2015.js && uglifyjs --comments --compress --mangle -- prod/vendor.js > prod/vendor.min.js
scripts.build-prod-app: rollup -c configs/rollup.config.prod.js && tsc --out ./prod/bundle.js --target es5  --allowJs prod/bundle.es2015.js && uglifyjs --comments --compress --mangle -- prod/bundle.js > prod/bundle.min.js
scripts.build-all: npm run build-vendor && npm run build-app
scripts.build-prod: npm run build-prod-vendor && npm run build-prod-app && npm run minify-vendor && npm run minify-bundle && node util/prod.finalize.js
scripts.dev: npm run lint && npm run build-app && node ./utils/build.vendor.js && concurrently "onchange 'app/**/*.ts' -i -- npm run build-app" "lite-server -c configs/ls.config.json"

author: schlotg
